instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' from Google Fonts for all headings. Add import to index.css.
Implement a 'safe-area' utility for iPhone notch/home bar handling.
Ensure all touch targets are at least 44px x 44px.
Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications (success, error, sync status).
For the 'Add Expense' modal, use a drawer/sheet on mobile and a dialog on desktop.
Implement swipe-to-delete using 'framer-motion' or a dedicated swipe library.
Charts must be responsive. Use 'recharts' with the defined color palette.
Dark mode is critical. Test all colors against #000000 background.
Do not use generic 'alert' or 'confirm'. Use custom styled dialogs.
The 'Sync Status' should be visible but unobtrusive (e.g., small dot in header).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - no generic gradients or centered text blocks.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. Whitespace is luxury.
Micro-animations for every interaction (hover, click, focus).
Never use pure black (#000000) for cards in dark mode; use #1C1C1E.
